title: Hindi Typography
content:
I need help urgently!

I am looking for a book that would probably have various Hindi Typefaces samples. Please help me find it. I tried Amazon.com, but I didnt get anything. I need to see samples.

I am looking for since three days and need urgent help!!!!!
author: smritajain

comments.content:
This is a tricky question. Volume One of B.S. Naik's _Typography of Devanagari_ has a few pages of specimen of old metal Devanagari faces, but this is probably not what you are looking for. I am guessing that you want digital fonts. I am not aware of a published book that can help you. There are a few PDFs from University of Reading graduates that could help you out (including my own) but these aren't published anywhere yet.

Indic font foundries have PDF catalogs that you can download. Here is one listing C-DAC's Devanagari typefaces – [http://www.cdac.in/html/gist/down/type/Devanagari.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201050720/http:/www.cdac.in/html/gist/down/type/Devanagari.pdf "http://www.cdac.in/html/gist/down/type/Devanagari.pdf")

(More on this page… [http://www.cdac.in/html/gist/down/typeface.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201050720/http:/www.cdac.in/html/gist/down/typeface.asp "http://www.cdac.in/html/gist/down/typeface.asp"))

Then there is Modular Infotech. [http://www.modular-infotech.com/downloads/fonts/Devratna.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201050720/http:/www.modular-infotech.com/downloads/fonts/Devratna.pdf "http://www.modular-infotech.com/downloads/fonts/Devratna.pdf")

(More on them here… [http://www.modular-infotech.com/html/fonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201050720/http:/www.modular-infotech.com/html/fonts.html "http://www.modular-infotech.com/html/fonts.html"))

Lastly, they haven't published any books yet, but I hope that they will – [http://www.indiantypefoundry.com/site/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201050720/http:/www.indiantypefoundry.com/site/index.php "http://www.indiantypefoundry.com/site/index.php")
